definition: to carve/carved words/to agree/a contract/a deed
to make an appointment/to invite/approximately/pact/treaty/to economize/to restrict/to reduce (a fraction)/concise
to weigh in a balance or on a scale

sentences.english: The second chapter will interpret Pateman's sexual contract theory .
sentences.chinese: 然後，對性契約理論發展進行探討。

sentences.english: Protected in a contract, the system will eventually evolve into knowledge-sharing.
sentences.chinese: 在有契約保障下，系統最終會演化爲知識共享。

sentences.english: Each extension point is unique and defines a contract to be adhered to.
sentences.chinese: 每個擴展點都是惟一的並且定義需要遵守的契約。

sentences.english: The ark itself contained the tablets of the covenant.
sentences.chinese: 方舟本身包含着寫有契約的便箋。

sentences.english: A: All we have to do is sign the contract .
sentences.chinese: 剩下的只要簽訂個契約就行了。

sentences.english: The house in the Rue Plumet being held on a lease, still belonged to Cosette.
sentences.chinese: 卜呂梅街的房子原有租賃契約，現在還屬於珂賽特。

sentences.english: Meanwhile, the contract also contributed to the development of the highly developed West, Civil and Commercial Law.
sentences.chinese: 同時，契約的發展也促進了西方民商法的高度發達。

sentences.english: It is difficult to judge whether or not the company type is better than the contract type.
sentences.chinese: 很難單純對公司型和契約型的優劣作出評判。

sentences.english: It is a fine example of contract civilization of medieval England's boroughs.
sentences.chinese: 這點可通過中古英國城市契約窺見一斑。

sentences.english: Postconditions are contracts to be met when a methods ends, and are specified with Contract.Ensures() as in the next example
sentences.chinese: 當方法結束時，後置條件表示其結果需要滿足的契約。

sentences.english: Doing so bakes the contracts into both development streams.
sentences.chinese: 這樣做，便可以把契約整合到雙方的開發線之中。

sentences.english: How about software tools that want to test or enforce the contract?
sentences.chinese: 對於那些想要測試或者增強契約的軟件工具怎麼辦？

sentences.english: Nudity is a threat to the basic social contract.
sentences.chinese: 裸露是對基本社會契約的一種威脅。

sentences.english: Enterprise's psychological contract violation does not necessarily lead to negative consumer's post-purchase behaviours.
sentences.chinese: 企業心理契約違背不一定導致負面的消費者購後行爲。

sentences.english: A contract founded on a disgraceful consideration or against good morals is null.
sentences.chinese: 基於不道德的約定或違反公序良俗的契約無效。

definition: to establish/to found/to create (a good environment)
provision/to fix/to set/to formulate/to stipulate/to provide/regulation/rule/CL:個|个[ge4]
norm/standard/specification/regulation/rule/within the rules/to fix rules/to regulate/to specify
